description: To mitigate the Windows authentication denial of service issue described in CVE-2023-36046, several updates are available. Users running Windows 11 version 23H2 for x64-based systems should install KB5032190, which can be found via the Microsoft Update Catalog at https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190. For those on Windows 11 version 22H2, the same KB5032190 update applies, as well as for Windows 11 version 21H2, which requires KB5032192 available at https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192. Additionally, the Windows Server 2022, 23H2 edition requires the update KB5032202, accessible at https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032202. Ensuring these updates are applied will effectively address the identified issue and enhance system stability across affected platforms.
